scripts.prisma:pull: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma db pull --schema=$schema; done
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate -d && bash wait-until-db-ready.bash
scripts.generate: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma generate --schema=$schema; done && rm -rf dist
